divs: Sighting Detailswas very cold that night. was bundled up for 20 degree weather. when blowing 40 miles an hour. low-level visibility 1 mIle. upper level visibility 30 mile. Had been watching jets dogfight and do maneuvers earlier that night. 11 to 2am maybe. was around 3 o'clock a.m. I noticed a triangular shaped object floating about a half mile north of my location. big white lights at each corner of the triangle on bottom part. a little while later accelerated turned and disappeared very fast. have more info. Not joke
